steps: Navigate to Work tab/Requests > My Tickets > Create Ticket
Fill in check-in/check-out date and time details
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Attendance regularization request is successfully submitted and tracked if the company has enabled and included the employee in the Attendance regularization policy.

what_to_do.task: Manage Time Off and Team Requests
steps: Switch to Manager View in mobile app
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Managers can effectively approve, reject, comment, and manage overlapping leave requests for their team.

what_to_do.task: Use Attendance Reports with Shift Scheduler
steps: View actual check-in and check-out timings
Edit attendance records by clicking the Edit button
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Users can view and edit attendance for all employees, including shift employees.

what_to_do.task: Set Up and Manage Attendance System
steps: Set up work timings, work weeks, offices, and work centers
Use shift scheduler to configure static or dynamic shifts
Manage employee check-ins/check-outs via mobile app
Activate geo-fencing and set up check-in/out notifications
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Attendance system supports both static and dynamic shift scheduling with mobile app integration and geo-fencing for accurate check-ins.

what_to_do.task: Use Attendance on Bayzat Mobile App
steps: Check-in to work and check-out from work
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Users can track attendance accurately with timely notifications and location services enabled; late check-ins trigger warnings and forgetting to check out means hours won't be counted.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Incorrect error message for check-in within threshold
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Strict validation rules require shifts to be published as working days before check-ins are accepted; early or late check-ins are rejected.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of comprehensive attendance variance reporting
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Cannot export or display pre-edit attendance values in reports, limiting tracking of attendance modifications.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Attendance report cannot distinguish legitimate vs illegitimate overtime
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Hours worked are calculated automatically without validating checkout legitimacy or indicating missing/manipulated records.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No mechanism to undo or edit approved extra hours requests
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Approved extra hours automatically add days to leave balance without reversal option.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No attendance tracking for half-day leave
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Employees cannot record attendance and HR cannot view or edit attendance for half-day leave.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave approval deletes existing attendance records causing data inconsistency
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No mechanism to preserve historical attendance records when leave requests are approved.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Historical attendance records cannot be modified after configuration changes
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Attendance records are locked to work timing configuration at check-in and cannot be updated retroactively.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Notification system requires manual tagging to alert stakeholders
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: No automatic notifications for comments on leave requests or attendance records.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No bulk status change for attendance adjustments
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users must rely on manual or unsupported backend methods for bulk changes.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of visibility into configuration flags affecting attendance calculations
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users cannot easily see how backend settings like break inclusion affect worked hours.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Unclear communication about attendance regularization and T&P adjustments
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users are not informed about conditions under which adjustments are deleted or recalculated.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Custom roles not automatically available in approval flow dropdowns
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Custom roles require explicit policy assignment to appear in approval flows.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Location validation for biometric check-ins is weak
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Employees can check in at locations different from scheduled shift location, causing discrepancies.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Attendance fraud detection limited by missing device ID metadata
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Cannot distinguish between legitimate manager-created check-ins and fraudulent ones when device ID is null.
